an1.485-494:1: " … (485) develops recollection of the Buddha … (486) develops recollection of the Dhamma … (487) develops recollection of the Saṅgha … (488) develops recollection of virtuous behavior … (489) develops recollection of generosity … (490) develops recollection of the deities … (49) develops mindfulness of breathing … (492) develops mindfulness of death … (493) develops mindfulness directed to the body … (494) develops recollection of peace … "
